text: jasindeul-i han illo gippeohago jasindeul-i haji anh-eun illo chingchanbadneun geos-eul joh-ahaneun jadeul-e daehae geudaeneun gyeolko saeng-gaghaji malla ; geudaeneun gyeolko geudeul-i beol-i eobsneun guwon-ui jangso-e issda saeng-gaghaji malla. geudeul-egeneun gotongseuleon beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
